  • Constructor Details

    • LendingService

      public LendingService()

  • Method Details

    • addLending

      public void addLending(LendingRequest request)
      It's checked whether there is the requested book in the library and at least one copy of it in the database. And if the library user with the inserted id code is registered as the user of the library. The due date is 1 week when there are less than 5 copies left or when the book has been acquired to the library less than 90 days ago. Otherwise, the due date is 4 weeks. Updates the copy quantity subtracting 1 as it's assumed that it's allowed to lend only one copy of a book at the time by one user.

    • updateOnReturn

      public void updateOnReturn(String idCode, String bookName)
      Updates the book from the list of not yet returned books (books the same user has been lent and returned before is left out). Returned lending gets a return date value and the new status "Tagastatud". Updates the copy quantity adding 1 as it's assumed that it's allowed to lend only one copy of a book at the time by one user.

    • getOverdueLendingList

      public List<LendingReturn> getOverdueLendingList()
      Finds lending list with status "Välja laenutatud" and selects books which due date is before current date. The difference between due date and current date is returned as daysOverdue property value in LendingReturn list.
